00129 inline CVector2d::CVector2d(const QPointF& point)
00130 {
00131        operator[](0) = point.x();
00132        operator[](1) = point.y();

00191 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetHorizontalTranslated(double offsetX) const

00197 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetVerticalTranslated(double offsetY) const

00202 
00203 inline double CVector2d::GetCrossProductZ(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const
00204 {
00205        return GetX() * vector[1] - GetY() * vector[0];
00206 }
00207 
00208 
00209 inline double CVector2d::GetAngle() const
00210 {
00211        return qAtan2(GetY(), GetX());
00212 }
00213 
00214

00236 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator*(double scalar) const

00243 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator/(double scalar) const
00244 {
00245        if (qAbs(scalar) < I_BIG_EPSILON){
00246               scalar = (scalar > 0)? I_BIG_EPSILON: -I_BIG_EPSILON;
00247        }
00248 
00249        return CVector2d(GetX() / scalar, GetY() / scalar);
00250 }

00287 inline CVector2d::operator QPointF() const
00288 {
00289        return QPointF(qreal(GetX()), qreal(GetY()));
